data.author: Justin Hamilton

changelog.release_notes:
New Customization Options!
Color customization, minute/hour ticks, etc.

New Complications:
- Bluetooth monitor
- Battery icon
- Day name
- Digital time
- Digital date

Removed Aplite (Pebble/Pebble Steel) version until the "graphics_context_set_stroke_width" command works on it. Without that command, it looks terrible.

data.description:
An analog watchface with 4 slots for customizable complications, so it can be as basic or as complicated as you want. 

Now includes color customization!

Current list of complications:

- Seconds Dial 
- Day Dial 
- Month Dial 
- Weekday Dial 
- Day Number 
- Logo (Top slot only) 
- Battery Gauge 
- Bluetooth monitor
- Battery icon
- Day name
- Digital time
- Digital date

I will be adding more in the future. Feel free to email me suggestions!

(Removed Aplite (Pebble/Pebble Steel) version until the "graphics_context_set_stroke_width" command works on it. Without that command, the app looks terrible.)
